'''15w40b''' is the thirtieth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on September 30, 2015<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2015/09/minecraft-snapshot-15w40a/</ref> to fix a bug that made it impossible to connect to servers, among other bugs.
